org.richfaces.log
Class JavaLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.richfaces.log.JavaLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class JavaLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

That logger delegates all calls to the JDK Logger

Author:
asmirnov@exadel.com, nick
